resources.string: Always busy and bustling with a constant stream of customers flowing in and checking out, this iconic restaurant-cum-dhaba in CP is know for it delectable desi food.
67, Municipal Market, Connaught Circle, Connaught Place, New Delhi
Restaurant specialised in Tonkatsu, fried pork cutlet.
AB-14B, Nauroji Nagar Marg, Opposite, Safdarjung Enclave, New Delhi, Delhi 110029

Credited with the trailblazing turn-around of Moti Mahal, from being a small but iconic presence in Delhi, to becoming a Multi-national Corporation that is well on its way to defining how the world eats Indian food.
157, Kapil Vihar, Pitampura, Opposite Metro Pillar no.355, NEW DELHI
Eclectically decorated restaurant for a wide variety of burgers in a casual setting.
Soranto Vaddo, Anjuna Mapusa Rd, Anjuna, Goa 403509

Driven by passion to surprise customer’s senses every time, Blind Ch3mistry, a progressive venture of 21 N 21 Food Ventures LLP is a luxury brand loved for its innovative and coolest variety of milkshakes.
M 7/2, 4th Main Rd, Besant Nagar, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600091
Auntys kitchen is located in middle bazar of Shimla and is known for its Momos throughout Shimla.
5, 44/31, Middle Bazar, Gunj Bazar, Shimla, Himachal Pradesh 171001
Vegetarian Spanish restaurant with wood-fired pizza oven at Himalayan holiday cottage complex.
Log Huts Road, Manali, Himachal Pradesh 175131
An exhilarating trek of 11 days in this mystique valley of Arunachal Pradesh is all about exploring and discovering the opulent nature of the state.
The best season to visit West Siang is the winter season and onset of summers that lasts from October to April.
Kaziranga National Park situated in Assam state of India, is a UNESCO world heritage sites of India and known for Great Indian one horned Rhinoceros.
The Park is open daily from 1st November to 30th April i.e., for 6 (six) months
Explore the under water marine life with trained and certified staff in Indias first and only adventurous Underwater Sea Walk facility in Goa.
for 12 months but not on rainy or stormy whether
Motorcycle Trip to Rann of Kutch
>Little desert of Kutch is a salt marsh located near the Great Rann of Kutch in Kutch district, Gujarat, India.
Best time to go, November to March (Rann Utsav is from December to March).
Bir-Billing is the best spot for Tandem Paragliding sessions in Himachal Pradesh, India.
March to May and October – November
Hampta Pass is one of the most delightful treks in the Manali region.
Best Time to Visit Deo Tibba Trek. During the early months of the year, there are chances of snow on high passes, which considerably melts by August.
Bara Bhangal Trek is one of the toughest and longest treks in Himachal Pradesh that can be recommended for enthusiastic trekkers.

There are so many things to do in Jammu and Kashmir but nothing more challenging than rafting in the white waters of the many rivers that cut through the state of Jammu and Kashmir. The two most famous rivers where you can go for this extreme sport is River Indus and Zanskar river.
Between the end of June and late August.
Camping in Coorg sounds like a wonderful choice. Coorg is full of hazy hills, lush dense forest, tea and coffee plantation, orange groves, undulating streets.
October to March is the best time

The Taj Mahal is an ivory white marble mausoleum on the south bank of the Yamuna river in the Indian city of Agra. It was commissioned in 1632 by the Mughal emperor, Shah Jahan, to house the tomb of his favourite wife, Mumtaz Mahal.
Dharmapuri, Forest Colony, Tajganj, Agra, Uttar Pradesh 282001
Govt. of India Tourism Office 191, Mall Road, Agra Ph. +91 562 2226368
Daytime: 06:00 am to 06:30 pm, Nighttime: 08:30 pm to 12:30 am.
The cost is 650 rupees for Indians and 3,000 rupees for foreigners.

The Red Fort is a historical fortification in the national capital of New Delhi. Located in the center of the city. The Red Fort Complex was built as the palace fort of Shahjahanabad – the new capital of the fifth Mughal Emperor of India, Shah Jahan..
Netaji Subhash Marg, Lal Qila, Chandni Chowk, New Delhi
All days of the week except Monday, 9:30 AM - 4:30 PM
35 rupees per person for Indians and 500 rupees per person for foriegners
3-streamed waterfall, named for its milky waters, with swimming pools surrounded by forest.
Calangute and Punjim: Wed, Sat and Sun, 6:30AM

Manali is a high-altitude Himalayan resort town in India’s northern Himachal Pradesh state. Set on the Beas River, it’s a gateway for skiing in the Solang Valley and trekking in Parvati Valley. Its also a jumpingoff point for paragliding, rafting and mountaineering in the Pir Panjal mountains, home to 4,000m high Rohtang Pass.
Search on web and Contact locals
The most sacred of Sikh shrines, the Golden Temple, is a major pilgrimage destination for devotees from around the world, as well as, an ever increasing popular tourist attraction.
Clock Tower Building, Golden Temple Rd, Gandhi Nagar, Atta Mandi, Katra Ahluwalia, Amritsar Cantt., Punjab 143006
Himachal Pradesh capital known for colonial architecture, Himalayan views and shopping on the mall.
Located in the middle ranges of the Himalayas
Search on web and Contact locals
Marina Beach is a natural urban beach in Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India,
Search on web and Contact locals
You can legally buy safe medicine, including prescription drugs, for very little money overseas. When in Asia. On location, it’s more like $1(72 rupees) for a 10-day supply.

Take a lot of cash with you, and make sure the bills are new and have no writing on them. If you go to a place that accepts credit cards, then you can just redeposit the cash when you get home. It is far worse to end up short of cash with no credit card option.

Hire a taxi whenever you are going because its more convinient in india by going through taxi rather than by sharing taxis. 

Never assume that your taxi driver knows where your destination is. Double-check and get him to ask someone before you go if there’s any doubt. 

The universal rule of taxi haggling, for both driver and passenger, is that once both sides agree on a fare before setting off, neither side can reopen negotiations once you’re en route. You should not try to get a better deal nor should you accept any increase in the fare from the driver after the journey has started.

When it comes to visas (and all immigration issues), your experience will vary from place to place. The rules are flexible in most places, and sometimes they will work in your favor and sometimes they will work against you.

All plane tickets are changeable no matter what is written on them, and any fees for changing can be waived with the right airline agent. 

Unless you can be very discreet, never take photos of people without asking. Don’t be surprised if they say no, because many cultures are not comfortable with strangers taking photos of them all the time. If they do say yes, you may find yourselves indebted to them for a gift or other favor. 

Never touch members of the opposite sex. This includes sitting next to them on buses and trains—you’ll often be shuffled around to ensure that you only sit next to people of the same sex, although you’ll also usually be given the best seat.

The concept of personal space means very different things in different countries. You kind of have to get used to that. 

Round-the-World tickets are the best bargains for extensive international travel. 

In some places, buses are better than trains for overland travel in other places, trains are better than buses. Check out the options before you go to make the best decision for each place.

Lastly, remember that there are not many “undiscovered” places left in the world. Focus on the places that are undiscovered to you and you won’t go wrong. \n\nObviously, each place you go to will offer unique challenges, but following this list will get you off to a good start. Above all, don’t forget the cardinal rule of traveling pack light. You really don’t need all the extra stuff.
